dashboard.label: Threat Lists Reference
dashboard.description: Reference list of ThreatER threat intelligence list sources and descriptions.

search.query: | inputlookup threater_threat_lists_reference.csv | eval list_name=coalesce(list_name, "") | eval provider=coalesce(provider, "") | eval description=coalesce(description, "") | eval subscription_required=coalesce(subscription_required, "") | eval notes=coalesce(notes, "") | table list_name provider subscription_required description notes
